Key Match Events: Lebanon defender Khalil Khamis escaped a straight red card after landing a kung fu kick on Chinese opponent in Asian Cup.
In the 23rd minute of the Asian Cup Group A fixture, Khamis accidentally kicked China's Dai Wai Tsun in his face while trying to clear a ball.
The match eventually ended in a goalless draw which allowed group toppers and hosts Qatar to progress to the knockout stage with six points from their first two matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: China's future in the tournament now hangs in the balance after they failed to register a win in their first two group games.
